item.title: On some non parametric estimators of the quantile density function for a stationary associated process
item.description: Yogendra P Chaubey, Isha Dewan, Jun Li “On some non parametric estimators of the quantile density function for a stationary associated process” (2023) // Communications in Statistics - Theory and Methods. Publisher: Informa UK Limited. Pp. 1–21.
